name: Borisin
desc: Flower of Annihilation appears in the Action Order. When Dewdrop breaks, it will Charge Flower of Annihilation by 600% of the Dewdrop's charge. When Flower of Annihilation takes action, it deals Charge value + 1200% of base DMG Fire DMG to all enemies. Every stack of Grit held by the team will additionally increase the DMG by 1.5%.
